Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Melbourne Avenue, west of the Dragon's Claw.
Room.LongDescription: The Dragon's Claw Tavern and Grill is a sophisticated restaurant where patrons may eat at the grill and drink some good, old-fashoioned ale in the company of friends. The entrance to the restaurant is located to the south along Melbourne Drive, which runs north and south from here.
